summary: The agent report is generally accurate with some omissions in root cause identification and causal chain completeness. Metrics and reasoning are strong, and the suggested actions are practical.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent identified DDR and MMDVFS as root causes but missed the CM (CPU Manager) aspect.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is partially captured, missing the CM to CPU link and SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, with minor omissions.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is mostly logical but lacks clarity on ruling out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: Suggested fixes are practical and relevant, with historical fixes referenced.
